text: have I got the recipe for you but the
answer is yes
it's an endlessly variable pureed
vegetable soup today I'm doing a
broccoli version so get your broccoli
all cut up this could be cauliflower
this could be lots of different
vegetables look it up on our website at
Martha Stewart comm and you'll see lots
of variations to this very recipe this
is a potato this is what helps thicken
it and give a little bit of weight to
the soup so it's one baking potato
that's been peeled and cut into pieces
and then you just need to sautee a
little bit of onion it's one onion in
some olive oil no need to be too
particular with this recipe this is an
onion you could use leek you could use
shallot you could use a combination give
it a little saute you almost don't
really need a recipe for this it's that
easy one onion one potato two pounds of
vegetables season with some salt and
pepper and when your onion has softened
after about five minutes you can add
your baking potato one 8-ounce potato as
well as all that broccoli it's a lot but
this is a broccoli soup and it's gonna
make plenty to have on hand this is
chicken broth it's one can with the 14
and a half ounce can that's about 1 and
3/4 cups and then add enough water to
just about cover your vegetables I like
to use a combination of broth and water
when I'm using canned broth because
canned broth can be a little bit salty
and so I balance that out with water
this isn't quite covering but I think
that's okay I don't want to overdo it
I'd rather actually add some water later
while I'm carrying this and not have my
soup come out too thin so I'm just gonna
leave it at this and bring it to a boil
and then simmer it until everything is
soft once this comes to a simmer you
want to cover it partially and then cook
it until everything is really nice and
tender tender enough to puree that'll
take about 20 minutes when your
vegetables are done they need to be very
tender so that you can puree them turn
it off I like to use an immersion
blender to puree my soup I think it's
super convenient put the little feet on
the bottom and then puree
you can also use a blender for this
obviously and you just want to puree
this all up get it smooth you want it to
be a little bit thicker add an
additional potato so instead of one used
to stir it and eat it and enjoy it
because you're gonna love it oh did I
mention it's only five ingredients yeah
that's right you saw it here guys
it's a five ingredient broccoli soup
from me to you
mmm so delicious great on its own great
with the squeeze of lemon great with a
sprinkle of cheese great with a drizzle
of cream but great just like it is five
ingredients broccoli soup enjoy
you
